docs.snippet: MANHASSET, L.I. THE Manhasset High School  gymnasium is becoming a focal point for college basketball scouts this season. There are  several in attendance at each game. The reason is an outstanding junior guard, Tommy Emma, one of those rare young...
docs.lead_paragraph: MANHASSET, L.I. THE Manhasset High School gymnasium is becoming a focal point for college basketball scouts this season. There are several in attendance at each game. The reason is an outstanding junior guard, Tommy Emma, one of those rare youngsters who seem certain, by all the standard measures, to make it big.

headline.main: All Eyes Are on Tommy Emma; A slight young basketball player stirs Long Island

docs.snippet: Arthur B. Krim, chairman of the United Artists Corporation and one of the three top officials of the big motion picture distributor who announced their resignations last Friday, said over the weekend......
docs.lead_paragraph: Arthur B. Krim, chairman of the United Artists Corporation and one of the three top officials of the big motion picture distributor who announced their resignations last Friday, said over the weekend...
docs.abstract: Arthur B Krim, chm of United Artists Corp and 1 of 3 top officials of corp (Robert S Benjamin and Eric Pleskow) who announced their resignation, says in phone int that barriers to adequately compensating other execs and employees was major reason for their controversial action; criticizes control placed on corp by parent co, Transamerica Corp, on amounts that could be paid as salaries (M)
